short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost Notion productivity with 20+ customizations like outline, small text full width for all, back to top button etc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Notion more productive and less distractive. Notion Boost is a lightweight extension to add extra features and tweaks to Notion:

âœ”ï¸ Show sticky outline (table of contents) for pages that have headings or sub-headings.
âœ”ï¸ Set full width for all pages by default.
âœ”ï¸ Set small text for all pages by default.
âœ”ï¸ Add 'Scroll to top' button.
âœ”ï¸ Disable AI menu when pressing space key.
âœ”ï¸ Show full text in table cells on mouse hover.
âœ”ï¸ Close slash command menu '/' by pressing space key.
âœ”ï¸ Don't show slash command menu when pressing '/'.
âœ”ï¸ Hide floating help button for all pages.
âœ”ï¸ Align document images to left instead of center.
âœ”ï¸ Show line numbers for code blocks.
âœ”ï¸ Enable spellcheck inside code blocks.
âœ”ï¸ Don't show popup menu when pasting external links.
âœ”ï¸ Hide red notification icon from sidebar.
âœ”ï¸ Add more height to page by hiding top padding, image cover, & icon
âœ”ï¸ Make bold text bolder when using Notion in dark mode.
âœ”ï¸ Truly hide 'Hidden columns' in Kanban board view.
âœ”ï¸ Hide comments section from all pages.
âœ”ï¸ Hide backlinks section from all pages.
âœ”ï¸ Open full pages instead of preview.
âœ”ï¸ Narrow spacing between list items.
âœ”ï¸ Add indentation lines to lists.
âœ”ï¸ Make Rollup URLs clickable.
âœ”ï¸ Add frame to images.
âœ”ï¸ Hide placeholder: Type '/' for commands.

ğŸ™ If you found this extension useful then please support it by rating â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜….

Notion Boost is also available for Firefox, Brave, and Edge.

Follow @NotionBoost (https://twitter.com/NotionBoost) for unique tips, tricks, and free goodies.

_________________________________________________________
HOW IT WORKS

1. Visit any notion page.
2. Click on the extension icon (clickable only when you are on a notion page).
3. A popup menu will appear, you can toggle features from there.

_________________________________________________________
WHO MADE THIS?

Notion Boost is made by Gourav Goyal (https://gourav.io). I am a tech founder and productivity freak who relies heavily on Notion to organize things and manage work. I made this extension to make Notion more productive (and less distractive) by filling the gaps which I feel are lacked in the product. I hope you find this extension helpful :)

_________________________________________________________
PRIVACY POLICY

Notion Boost extension is an open-source project and has no ads, no analytics, no trackers, and no use of cookies. Furthermore, Notion Boost extension does not store or send any data from your Notion account.
